::DeathScythe::

DeathScythe lands near a mountain. His internal repairs have been completed, 
and the assassin transforms into his hideous robot mode. He walks into the 
cave, his scanners picking up bots within.

He looks around at all the bots and the equipment, making sure to stay close 
to the exit so he can run out if they take this the wrong way.

"I'm joining. Who're we killing right now?" he asks, looking at the biggest 
bot in the room (Megatron).
